info.headline: Tornado Warning issued May 15 at 1:37PM CDT until May 15 at 2:15PM CDT by NWS Twin Cities/Chanhassen MN
info.description:
TORMPX
The National Weather Service in the Twin Cities has issued a
* Tornado Warning for... Southwestern Pope County in west central Minnesota... Southeastern Stevens County in west central Minnesota... Eastern Swift County in west central Minnesota...
* Until 215 PM CDT.
* At 137 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm capable of producing a tornado was located near Benson, or 24 miles northeast of Montevideo, moving north at 40 mph.
HAZARD...Tornado.
SOURCE...Radar indicated rotation.
IMPACT...Flying debris will be dangerous to those caught without shelter. Mobile homes will be damaged or destroyed. Damage to roofs, windows and vehicles will occur. Tree damage is likely.
* Locations impacted include... Morris, Benson, Starbuck, Hancock, Kerkhoven, Cyrus, Murdock, Lake Hassel, Gilchrist, Clontarf, De Graff, Danvers, Lake Emily, Benson Airport, Glacial Lakes State Park, Swift Falls and Lake Minnewaska.
info.instruction: Move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a well-built building away from windows. If you are outdoors, in a mobile home, or in a vehicle, move to the closest substantial shelter and protect yourself from flying debris.

parameter.value: NWS: TORNADO WARNING in this area til 2:15 PM CDT. Take shelter now. Check media.

National Weather Service: TORNADO WARNING in this area until 2:15 PM CDT. Take shelter now in a basement or an interior room on the lowest floor of a sturdy building. If you are outdoors, in a mobile home, or in a vehicle, move to the closest substantial shelter and protect yourself from flying debris. Check media.

area.areaDesc: Pope, MN; Stevens, MN; Swift, MN

parameter.value: SNM:AVISO DE TORNADO hasta las 2:15 PM CDT. Refugiese ahora. Consulte medios informativos

Servicio Nacional de Meteorologia: AVISO DE TORNADO en efecto hasta las 2:15 PM CDT. Busque refugio ahora en un sotano o en el interior de un cuarto en el nivel mas bajo de un edificio seguro. Si esta al aire libre, en una casa movil, o en un vehiculo, debe ir al edificio seguro mas cercano y protegerse de proyectiles. Consulte los medios informativos.

area.areaDesc: Pope, MN; Stevens, MN; Swift, MN
